name: df-eupth
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(ceupth, cmpt(s0, universe, copab(s1, s2, wa(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(ctrls, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wfo(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfzo, cfv(chash, cv(s1))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ EulerPaths =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s1, s2 > |(s1[(Trails ` s0)]s2 ‚àß(s1 :(0[..^](# ` s1))‚Ü† dom((iEdg ` s0))))})
comment: Define the set of all Eulerian paths on an arbitrary graph. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Feb-2021.)
